HUD: {:CMT:start, join, leave or end a HUDDle (⌘⇧H)}{:KEY_COMBO:SUPER_L(SHIFT_L(H))}
PR*EPL: {:CMT:jump to PREvious unread channel or direct Message (⌥⇧↑)}{:KEY_COMBO:ALT_L(SHIFT_L(UP))}
SKWR-PL: {:CMT:JuMp to the most recent unread message in a conversation (⌘J)}{:KEY_COMBO:SUPER_L(J)}
TPH*EPL: {:CMT:jump to NExt unread channel or direct Message (⌥⇧↓)}{:KEY_COMBO:ALT_L(SHIFT_L(DOWN))}
